name: Fredbear's Family Diner Remake
description:
STORY

Many years ago, there was a fast food place called Fredbear's Family Diner, but it got closed down due to the bite of 83. Then one day the place got reopened in 2014 and it's featuring more gadgets. Such as New version Fredbear and SpringBonnie. (And maybe a few more...)

CREDITS

Scott Cawthon ; for making FNaF

Kubaburza; the coder and artist for FFD 1 R

Garrett Tube,Rhadamus and MidaGames ; for some inspiration!

FEATURES

Extras Menu

Custom Night

Cool Soundtrack

Yellow Bear Boss Fight
